sentences: He may have been the Guy de Couci who was castellan of Château de Coucy from 1186 to 1203.

The legend of the love of the Châtelain de Coucy and the Lady of Fayel, in which there figures a jealous husband who makes his wife eat the heart of her lover, has no historical basis, and dates from a late 13th century romance by Jakemon Sakesep.
